mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id AS productId, p.seller_id AS sellerId, p.product_name AS productName, p.price AS price, p.main_image_url AS mainImageUrl, p.region_display_name AS regionDisplayName, p.view_count AS viewCount, p.like_count AS likeCount, p.created_at AS createdAt FROM products p WHERE p.seller_id = #{sellerId} AND p.sales_status = 'ON_SALE' ORDER BY p.created_at DESC
